duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare individual, partnership, corporate, and trust income tax returns.
Assist with 1099s and business property tax returns.
Conduct year-round tax planning and consulting, including quarterly estimate and extension calculations.
Direct administrative team to assist with data collection.
Follow an organized system to deliver an optimal client experience.

education_certification.credential: 3+ years of tax experience preparing individual and corporate income tax returns is a must. Knowledge of Federal and California tax law. Enrolled Agent (EA) is a plus. Experience working with closely held businesses. Industry knowledge of medical practices, manufacturing and construction is a plus.
